p: Over 65 .NET controls, including the ones you can't get anywhere else. ComponentOne Studio for WinForms controls come packed with smart, code-free designers, endless built-in features that go above and beyond the out-of-the box experience, superior flexibility and the outstanding assurance that these controls can stand the test of time.

tr.td: ComponentOne Editor Winforms Edition now supports loading and saving text from and to RTF files. Any XHTML content rendered into the Editor Document can now be saved directly to the RTF format. Loading an RTF file shows the content with RTF formatting intact. Launch Demo.

ul.li: ComponentOne GanttView for WinForms delivers a Microsoft Project-like user experience for project management. It provides a graphical diagram of a schedule that helps to plan, coordinate, and track specific tasks in a project. Manage your projects effectively and efficiently with added support for constraints, dependencies, resources, styles and more. Launch Demo.
